title: Chimichurri Steak
instructions: Make chimichurri: Finely chop fresh parsley, oregano, and garlic. Mix with olive oil, red wine vinegar, red pepper flakes, and salt. Set aside.
Remove planted.steak from packaging and pat dry. Season generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a grill pan or skillet over high heat until smoking. Add a drizzle of olive oil.
Sear the steak for 3-4 minutes per side until deeply caramelized with nice grill marks.
Transfer to a cutting board and let rest for 2 minutes.
Slice against the grain, drizzle generously with fresh chimichurri sauce, and serve with grilled vegetables.
